Title: The Little Vampire 3D
Genre: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Horror
Writer: Richard Claus, Angela Sommer-Bodenburg (based on stories and characters by), Larry Wilson
Actors: Rasmus Hardiker, Amy Saville, Jim Carter, Joseph Kloska
Plot: The story of Rudolph, a thirteen year old vampire, whose clan is threatened by a notorious vampire hunter. He meets Tony, a mortal of the same age, who is fascinated by old castles, ...
